question: List all driver names.
sql: SELECT forename, surname AS name FROM drivers;
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) RETURN d.forename, d.surname AS name;

question: Get the names of all constructors.
Find the number of races held in 2010.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races WHERE year = 2010;

question: Which driver won the 2008 British Grand Prix?
sql: SELECT d.forename, d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.year = 2008 AND ra.name = 'British Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1;
cypher: MATCH (ra:races {year: 2008, name: 'British Grand Prix'})<-[:IN_RACE]-(res:results {position: 1})-[:ACHIEVED]->(d:drivers) RETURN d.forename, d.surname;

question: Show the circuit name for the 2019 Monaco Grand Prix.
sql: SELECT c.name FROM races r JOIN circuits c ON r.circuitId = c.circuitId WHERE r.year = 2019 AND r.name = 'Monaco Grand Prix';
cypher: MATCH (r:races {year: 2019, name: 'Monaco Grand Prix'})-[:HELD_AT]->(c:circuits) RETURN c.name;

question: List all years when the Italian Grand Prix was held.
sql: SELECT year FROM races WHERE name = 'Italian Grand Prix' ORDER BY year;
cypher: MATCH (r:races {name: 'Italian Grand Prix'}) RETURN r.year ORDER BY r.year;

question: Get the total number of drivers in the database.
Find the nationality of the constructor named 'Ferrari'.
sql: SELECT nationality FROM constructors WHERE name = 'Ferrari';

question: Show all race names in the 2020 season.
sql: SELECT name FROM races WHERE year = 2020;
